marketing information: This 16-inch portable LEDA light-emitting-diode (LED) is a semiconductor diode that emits light when an electric current is applied in the forward direction of the device, as in the simple LED circuit. The effect is a form of electroluminescence where incoherent and narrow-spectrum light is emitted from the p-n junction. monitor is a must-have laptop accessory and receives both power and signal via a single USB cable for plug-and-play connection.
